author: ehatcher
msg: added test to ensure XMLCatalog *and* classpath are working as expected.

author: ehatcher
msg: modified to internally use an XMLCatalog rather than the LocalResolver.

Note: one potential API break, I removed public Vector dtdLocationsr, but it was added after 1.4.1 release, so would only be a problem if classes written for 1.5alpha relied on it which is unlikely, and too bad for them!  :)

author: ehatcher
msg: add support for multiple XMLCatalogs - sort of unfriendly to only allow one without giving an error if more than one was specified :)

author: ehatcher
msg: add support for classpath, and ensure that relative files are resolved properly.
the classpath appending when nesting XMLCatalogs may need to be rearranged, not sure.

author: ehatcher
msg: fixed XMLValidate task and test - see the kind of trouble we can get into using String for filename parameters?!  :)
